ai-ja351:1.4_0: why do you not the good thing?”
ai-ja351:2.1_0: “In the past life they give up their wealth,
ai-ja351:2.2_0: Or perhaps a mortal abandons it sooner.
ai-ja351:2.3_0: Wealth is not eternal, O Lover of Yourself,
ai-ja351:2.4_0: That’s why I do not grieve at the wrong time.
ai-ja351:3.1_0: The moon rises, becoming full, and then wanes again,
ai-ja351:3.2_0: The sun after blazing the sun
ai-ja351:3.3_0: may the world be destroyed by me, ~ may I proclaim the world.
ai-ja351:3.4_0: that’s why I do not grieve at the wrong time.”
ai-ja351:4.2_0: An unrestrained monk is (also) not good,
ai-ja351:4.3_0: An inconsiderate King is not good,
ai-ja351:4.4_0: The Wise One is not good,
